Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.28236791] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=32 μg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria :Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=32 μg/ml)
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The spectra obtained confirmed an alpha-helix conversion in the presence of negatively charged micelles.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria
